scripts.build: rm -rf dist/*;cp -R public/css dist/;cp public/index.html dist/index.html;cp -R public/icons dist/;cp public/favicon.ico dist/favicon.ico;cp -R public/js dist/js;echo CHANGE THE BASE REFERENCE BEFORE UPLOADING;
scripts.postinstall: mkdir -p public/test/scripts; mkdir -p public/test/styles;ln -s -f node_modules/mocha/mocha.js public/test/scripts/mocha.js;ln -s -f node_modules/mocha/mocha.css public/test/styles/mocha.css;ln -s -f node_modules/chai/chai.js public/test/scripts/chai.js
